languages.text: Сводка о состоянии "Бессердечного" свидетельствует, что хотя попытка выхода в варп и потрепала корабль, он достойно выдержал это испытание и остается на ходу.
The Heartless's status report states that while the ship took a beating when attempting to enter the warp, it has passed that trial and remains fit for service.
languages.original_text: Сводка о состоянии "Бессердечного" свидетельствует, что хотя попытка выхода в варп и потрепала корабль, он достойно выдержал это испытание и остается на ходу.

traits.locale_text: The Heartless status report states that while the ship took a beating when attempting to enter the warp, it has passed that challenge and remains space-worthy.
The Heartless status report states that while the ship took a beating when attempting to enter the warp, it has passed that challenge and remains space-worthy.
The Heartless's status report states that while the ship took a beating when attempting to enter the warp, it has passed that challenge and remains space-worthy.
The Heartless's status report states that while the ship took a beating when attempting to enter the warp, it has passed that challenge and remains space-worthy.
The Heartless's status report states that while the ship took a beating when attempting to enter the warp, it has passed that trial and remains fit for service.
The Heartless's status report states that while the ship took a beating when attempting to enter the warp, it has passed that trial and remains fit for service.

languages.text: Aus dem Statusbericht der Heartless geht hervor, dass das Schiff beim versuchten Eintritt in den Warp zwar beschädigt wurde, aber immer noch diensttauglich ist.
languages.original_text: The Heartless's status report states that while the ship took a beating when attempting to enter the warp, it has passed that trial and remains fit for service.

traits.locale_text: Aus dem Statusbericht der Heartless geht hervor, dass das Schiff beim versuchten Eintritt in den Warp zwar beschädigt wurde, aber immer noch diensttauglich ist.

languages.text: Le rapport de maintenance du Sans-Cœur indique que le vaisseau a subi des avaries en tentant d'entrer dans le Warp, mais qu'il a surmonté cette épreuve et reste opérationnel.
languages.original_text: The Heartless's status report states that while the ship took a beating when attempting to enter the warp, it has passed that trial and remains fit for service.

traits.locale_text: Le rapport de maintenance du Sans-Cœur indique que le vaisseau a subi des avaries en tentant d'entrer dans le Warp, mais qu'il a surmonté cette épreuve et reste opérationnel.

languages.text: El informe de estado de la Desalmada confirma que, si bien la nave sufrió daños de consideración al intentar un salto a la disformidad, logró superar la ordalía y sigue siendo apta para el servicio.
languages.original_text: The Heartless's status report states that while the ship took a beating when attempting to enter the warp, it has passed that trial and remains fit for service.

traits.locale_text: El informe de estado de la Desalmada confirma que, si bien la nave sufrió daños de consideración al intentar un salto a la disformidad, logró superar la ordalía y sigue siendo apta para el servicio.

languages.text: 无心号的状况报告显示，尽管这艘飞船在进入亚空间时受损，但它仍旧通过了亚空间的考验，仍然可以正常服役。
languages.original_text: The Heartless's status report states that while the ship took a beating when attempting to enter the warp, it has passed that trial and remains fit for service.

traits.locale_text: 无心号的状况报告显示，尽管这艘飞船在进入亚空间时受损，但它仍旧通过了亚空间的考验，仍然可以正常服役。

languages.text: ハートレスの状況報告によれば、〈歪み〉突入時に損傷を受けたものの、その試練を乗り越え、引き続き運用可能な状態になっているようだ。
languages.original_text: The Heartless's status report states that while the ship took a beating when attempting to enter the warp, it has passed that trial and remains fit for service.

traits.locale_text: ハートレスの状況報告によれば、〈歪み〉突入時に損傷を受けたものの、その試練を乗り越え、引き続き運用可能な状態になっているようだ。

languages.text: Taşkalp'in durum raporuna göre gemi, öteboyuta girmeye çalışırken bir darbe almış ancak bu teşebbüsten tek parça çıkmayı başarmış ve hizmetine kaldığı yerden devam edebilmiş.
languages.original_text: The Heartless's status report states that while the ship took a beating when attempting to enter the warp, it has passed that trial and remains fit for service.

traits.locale_text: Taşkalp'in durum raporuna göre gemi, öteboyuta girmeye çalışırken bir darbe almış ancak bu teşebbüsten tek parça çıkmayı başarmış ve hizmetine kaldığı yerden devam edebilmiş.
